titleInfo.title: Blue Jay Marching Band at the Music City Bowl

mods.abstract: Three color window card (black, blue, and gray on beige) announcing the Junction City High School Blue Jay Marching Band performing in the Music City Bowl on December 31. Poster features a woodcut of a blue jay.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
